description.p: Fairies are small, magical creatures with a strong connection to nature and the Feywild. They are known for their playful personalities and innate spellcasting abilities.
Your fairy character has the following racial traits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score by 2, and increase a different one by 1, or increase three different scores by 1 each.
Creature Type. You are a Fey.
Size. You are Small.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Fairy Magic. You know the druidcraft cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast faerie fire once per day. Starting at 5th level, you can also cast enlarge/reduce once per day. You can cast these spells without material components, and you regain the ability to cast them this way when you finish a long rest. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells (choose when you select this race).
Flight. You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. You can't use this flying speed if you're wearing medium or heavy armor.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.
